title: Tu Seras Terriblement Gentille = You'll Be Awfully Nice
description: Clara and Patrice decide to separate. Filled with ambition, Patrice goes to Paris to work as a photographer. Clara obtains custody of their daughter Julie. Although Clara and Julie remain without news from Patrice for years, the little girl has not lost hope of seeing her parents getting back together. One day, they decide to travel to Paris ...  Credits: Producer, Louis Duchesne, Rene Thevenet ; director, Dirk Sanders ; writers, Dirk Sanders, Paul Soreze ; photography, Roger Duculot ; music, Jacques Loussier. Cast: Frederic de Pasquale, Karen Blanguernon, Leslie Bedos, Jean Moussy, Victor Moussy.
